longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
 - Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
   5 years) National ID Cards issued 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals France. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for nationals
of French Polynesia. 
Minors:
- Unaccompanied passengers under 18 years of age
   
- Minors born abroad to nationals of Macedonia (FYROM) and not
  holding a passport, must 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of French Polynesia will be
  expected to hold their own passport or National ID Card
  (where applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia,
  Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- A valid visa in an expired passport
   
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
